documentation.text:
@dev Emitted when the allowance of a `spender` for an `owner` is set by
 a call to {approve}. `value` is the new allowance.

@dev Sets the values for {name} and {symbol}.
 The defaut value of {decimals} is 18. To select a different value for
 {decimals} you should overload it.
 All three of these values are immutable: they can only be set once during
 construction.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ERC20: approve from the zero address"

Approval(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when the allowance of a `spender` for an `owner` is set by a call to {approve}. `value` is the new allowance.

approve(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-approve}. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

constructor.details: Sets the values for {name} and {symbol}. The defaut value of {decimals} is 18. To select a different value for {decimals} you should overload it. All three of these values are immutable: they can only be set once during construction.
